entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning this evening. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and overnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow with risk of freezing rain. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
